explanation: The stage direction 'D'Orfeuil est resté un moment étourdi de sa chute ; il se relève.' describes a character who has fallen and then gets back up. This falls under character movement as it is about the character changing their position on the stage from lying down or being on the ground to standing up.
stgdir: D'Orfeuil est resté un moment étourdi de sa chute ; il se relève.
